+import java.nio.file.Path;
+
+import org.testng.Assert;
+import org.testng.annotations.DataProvider;
+import org.testng.annotations.Test;
+
+/*
+ * @test
+ * @bug 8057113
+ * @summary Verify getExtension method
+ * @run testng Extensions
+ */
+public class Extensions {
+    /**
+     * Returns path name string and expected extension pairs.
+     *
+     * @return {@code {{"pathname", "extension"},...}}
+     */
+    @DataProvider
+    static Object[][] pathExtProvider() {
+        Object[][] pairs = {
+            {"",               ""},
+            {".",              ""},
+            {"..",             ""},
+            {"...",            ""},
+            {"....",           ""},
+            {".....",          ""},
+            {"aa",             ""},
+            {"a.",             ""},
+            {".a",             ""},
+            {"..a",            ""},
+            {"...a",           ""},
+            {"....a",          ""},
+            {"a...gus",        "gus"},
+            {".a.b",           "b"},
+            {"...a.b",         "b"},
+            {"...a.b.",        ""},
+            {".foo",           ""},
+            {"..foo",          ""},
+            {"foo.",           ""},
+            {"foo..",          ""},
+            {"foo..b",         "b"},
+            {"test.",          ""},
+            {"test..",         ""},
+            {"test...",        ""},
+            {"test.rb",        "rb"},
+            {"a/b/d/test.rb" , "rb"},
+            {".a/b/d/test.rb", "rb"},
+            {"test",           ""},
+            {".profile",       ""},
+            {".profile.sh",    "sh"},
+            {"foo.tar.gz",     "gz"},
+            {"foo.bar",        "bar"},
+            {"foo.bar.",       ""},
+            {"archive.zip",    "zip"},
+            {"compress.gzip",  "gzip"},
+            {"waitwhat.&$!#%", "&$!#%"},
+            {"6.283185307",    "283185307"}
+        };
+        return pairs;
+    }
+
+    @Test(dataProvider = "pathExtProvider")
+    public static void get(String pathname, String extension) {
+        Assert.assertEquals(Path.of(pathname).getExtension(), extension);
+    }
+
+    @Test(dataProvider = "pathExtProvider")
+    public static void with(String pathname, String extension) {
+        Path p = Path.of(pathname);
+        Path expected = p;
+        Path actual = p.withExtension(extension);
+        Assert.assertEquals(actual, expected);
+    }
+
+    @Test(dataProvider = "pathExtProvider")
+    public static void without(String pathname, String extension) {
+        Path p = Path.of(pathname);
+        Path expected = p;
+        String ext = p.getExtension();
+        Path actual = Path.of(p.withoutExtension().toString()
+                              + (ext.isEmpty() ? "" : ("." + extension)));
+        Assert.assertEquals(actual, expected);
+    }
+}
